question: Buatkan saya pekerja dan ruangan yang ada di restaurant dalam bahasa inggris sebanyak 14 buah

answers.answer:
pekerjaan :
chef, kitchener, cook, sea,  waiter, waitress, maid, servant, bellhop, steward, maid, maidservant, 
parlourmaid, parlormaid, stewardess, cleener, sweeper, laundryman,

Ruangan : 
kitchen, fire, cook room, supper room, dinner room, dine, ball room , changing room, dancing room, bar, lobby

related_questions.question: Contoh narative text pendek tentang hewan dan terjemahan nya?

answers.answer:
Story of Venus and the Cat
A Cat fell in love with a handsome young man, and begged the goddess Venus to change her into a woman. Venus was very gracious about it, and changed her at once into a beautiful maiden, whom the young man fell in love with at first sight and shortly afterwards married. One day Venus thought she would like to see whether the Cat had changed her habits as well as her form; so she let a mouse run loose in the room where they were. Forgetting everything, the young woman had no sooner seen the mouse than up she jumped and was after it like a shot: at which the goddess was so disgusted that she changed her back again into a Cat.

Terjemahannya :
Cerita Venus dan Kucing
Suatu ketika,seekor kucing jatuh cinta dengan seorang pemuda tampan, dan memohon dewi Venus untuk mengubah dirinya menjadi seorang wanita. Dewi Venus menerima permintaan tersebut, dan seketika mengubah dirinya menjadi seorang gadis cantik dimana pemuda tersebut langsung jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama dan tak lama kemudian mereka menikah. Suatu hari dewi Venus berpikir melihat apakah seekor kucing itu telah berubah kebiasaan serta bentuk nya, Maka dewi Venus menizinkan seekor tikus berjalan santai di suatu ruang di mana mereka berada. Seketika itu pula gadis cantik itu melupakan semuanya dan melompat ke arah tikus dengan sangat cepat. Hal ini membuat dewi Venus merasa begitu jijik dan merubahnya kembali menjadi seekor kucing.

related_questions.question:
Soba is a small town in my country,Sudan.It is 15 kilometres from Khartoum,The Capital of Sudan.The Nile River flows through Soa.That makes the green and beautiful.Most of  the pople in Soba works as farmers or a fisherman.The Nile is very important in their lives.A small market in Soba sells food to the people who cannot go to the market in the capital. In Soba,a small hospital and a pharmacy gives medicine to the people without money.About 50 percent of the people in Soba work in the hospital.The youth a place to meet every night except Friday. Friday is a holy day in Soba,so the people go to the mosque,and they say their prays.The people in Soba love their town.They are very happy because Soba is crowded with beautiful things.   Question 1.What is the text talking about? 2.What is the suitable title for the text?
 3.What is the function of the text?
 4.When is holy day in Soba?
 5.Where is Soba located?

answers.answer:
1. Soba
2. Soba Town
3. to describe Soba more specific 
4. On Friday
5. 15 kilometers from Khartoum, the capital of sudan (:

related_questions.question: Contoh opini setuju dengan adanya saving a parkland.

answers.answer:
"i agree to save the parkland, because it will be very good to save the nature. beside that, park is a place where children play. we dont want to ruin their happiness:D and beside that, we can even do a picnic in a park. so, we must stop destroying a parkland. it will be useful in another day"
semoga membantu:D

i agree to save parkland,cause parkland usually made as a oxigen producers of a big city ,a parkland can make a ton of oxygen so parkland must build in the centre of the city to absorb the carbon dioxide and produce oxigen

lingking verb"be"/auxiliary verb +/-not+pronoun
note:
----> lingking verb "be" (yaitu:is,am,was,were,are)
----> auxiliary verb berupa primary auxiliary verb (be,do,have) atau modal auxiliary verb(will, would, may, might,can, could, shall, should) yg cocok dg verb bagian pernyataan
-----> pronoun yg cocok dg subject bagian pernyataan.
example: you love sains, don't you?

gambar pohon keluargamu dan tulis tulisan dimana bantuan menolongmu
1. siapa nama ayahmu?
2. siapa nama ibumu?
3. apa nama saudara laki-laki atau perempuanmu?
4. apakah kamu mempunyai paman atau tante?

buatlah gambar/kerangka(seperti peta konsep) keluargamu, buatlah sebuah teks tentang keluargamu !
petunjuk di bawah ini akan membantumu:
1. siapakah nama ayahmu?
2. siapakah nama ibumu?
3.siapakah nama saudara laki-laki dan perempuanmu?
4. apakah kamu memiliki paman dan bibi?

tugasnya itu membuat kerangka tentang kaluargamu, seperti bagan.

minum = drink (v1) dringking (continuous)
menanam = plant (v1) planted (verb2) planting (continuous)

related_questions.question:
Arrange the following jumbled words into correct senteces.    1. uses - butcher - to - knive - cut - meat - the.
2. has - cow - farmer - a - the - field - the - rice - plow - to.
3. his - picture - with - takes - camera - photographer - a - the.
4. a policeman - civilians - protects - the.
5. doctor - helps - take care - a nurse - to - patiens - the.
6. the - write - uses - typewriter - writer - to.
7. sends - by - a - letters - postman - motorcycle.

answers.answer:
1. Butcher uses knife to cut the meat
2. The farmer has a cow to plow the rice field
3. The photagrapher takes a picture with his camera
4. A policeman protects the civillians
5. A nurse helps the doctor to take care patients
6. Writer uses the typewriter to write
7. A postman sends letters by motorcycle

related_questions.question:
Fill in the blank with:    there is, there are, there isn't, there aren't, is there, are there
1. ... any goats in the rice field.
2. ... five big island in Indonesia.
3. ... some entertaiment places in Yogya.
4. ... a glass of tea under the chair.
5. ... any tables in the class? Yes, there is
6. ... a box of pencils in the drawer.
7. ... a basket in the room? Yes, there is
8. ... some ruler in the box.
9. ... any matches in the cupboard.
10. ... some water in the pail.
11. ... some pictures on the wall.
12. ... a new teacher in my school.
13. ... any student in the yard.
14. ... a can of milk on the table.
15. ... a bird on the tree? Yes, there is.

answers.answer:
1. There aren't
2. There are
3. There are
4. There is 
5. Is there
6. There is
7. Is there
8. There are
9. There aren't
10. There is
11. There are
12. There is
13. There isn't
14. There is
15. Is there

2. there are
